title: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, it produces a beep sound. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: After selecting SWT.MULTI, clicking on other buttons also produces the bell sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not produce a beep sound when SWT.MULTI is chosen. Clicking on other buttons should not trigger the bell sound either.
SR:
1. Open ControlExampleText in SWT.
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe and verify that a beep sound is produced.
4. Click on other buttons and ensure that the bell sound is not triggered.
